analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoCupVirtualMatch.teamPrizeClaim (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#508-525):
	External calls:
	- teams[_teamId].owner = cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_teamId) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#518-523)
	External calls sending eth:
	- teams[_teamId].owner.transfer(teams[_teamId].balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- teams (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol)

CryptoCupVirtualMatch.getMatchReport (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#388-479) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- theMatch.homeScore == theMatch.awayScore
	- block.timestamp % 2 == 0

Reentrancy in CryptoCupVirtualMatch.createMatch (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#225-245):
	External calls:
	- teams[_homeTeam] = Team(_homeTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_homeTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#230-233)
	- teams[_awayTeam] = Team(_awayTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_awayTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#235-237)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- teams (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#235-237)

Reentrancy in CryptoCupVirtualMatch.createPlayerMatch (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#194-225):
	External calls:
	- teams[_homeTeam] = Team(_homeTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_homeTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#207-208)
	- teams[_awayTeam] = Team(_awayTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_awayTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#211-213)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- teams (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#211-213)

Reentrancy in CryptoCupVirtualMatch.createMatch (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#225-245):
	External calls:
	- teams[_homeTeam] = Team(_homeTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_homeTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#230-233)
	- teams[_awayTeam] = Team(_awayTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_awayTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#235-237)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- matchCounter (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#238-239)
	- matches (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#241-244)

Reentrancy in CryptoCupVirtualMatch.createPlayerMatch (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#194-225):
	External calls:
	- teams[_homeTeam] = Team(_homeTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_homeTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#207-208)
	- teams[_awayTeam] = Team(_awayTeam,cryptoCupTokenContract.ownerOf(_awayTeam),0,true) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#211-213)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- matchCounter (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#217)
	- matches (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#217-221)

CryptoCupVirtualMatch.getMatchReport (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#388-479) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp % 2 == 0 (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#426-430)

CryptoCupVirtualMatch.commentating should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#74-76)
CryptoCupVirtualMatch.teamCounter should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#73-74)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/17/0xf76557d533e7adf2e74a9d9d8b833c73809ba7c1.sol#1): it allows old versions
